sub_fields.label: Image & Text Alignment
sub_fields.name: image_text_alignment
sub_fields.instructions: Choose the vertical alignment for the image and text.

sub_fields.label: Mobile Order
sub_fields.name: mobile_order
sub_fields.instructions: Choose the order for the image and text on mobile devices.

sub_fields.label: Columns
sub_fields.name: columns
sub_fields.instructions: Set columns per row. Use 0 to fit all columns automatically in a single row.

sub_fields.label: Alignment
sub_fields.name: alignment
sub_fields.instructions: Choose the vertical alignment for the features.

sub_fields.label: Slides Per Row
sub_fields.name: slides_per_row
sub_fields.instructions: Set the number of slides to display in a row.

sub_fields.label: Slides Per Move
sub_fields.name: slides_per_move
sub_fields.instructions: Set the number of slides to move at once.

sub_fields.label: Responsive
sub_fields.name: responsive
sub_fields.instructions: Change the number of slides to show on specific breakpoints.
